ResearchProjectDef.label: Corellian Engineering Corporation - basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct the structural and supportive elements of a corellian starship.

ResearchProjectDef.label: CR90 corvette - parts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a CR90 corvette with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: CR90 corvette - turrets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Add turrets to your CR90 corvette for ship-to-ship combat.
